notes: [Improved] Moved release feed to Github
[Improved] Updated default pattern for Phone field to work with Android and iPhone devices
[Improved] Updated legacy Redactor syntax for lists
[Fixed] Fixed bug in Notes field where the 'Default' style option would throw an error in Sprout Forms front-end field output
[Fixed] Fixed bug in Notes field where 'Hide Field Label' option had no effect on Sprout Forms front-end field output
[Fixed] Fixed incorrect placeholder text in Invisible field settings
[Fixed] Fixed bug in Phone field where submitting an empty field would not save if Pattern Mask was enabled
[Added] Added Regular Expression Field type
[Added] Added Notes Field Default style option
[Added] Added Notes Field option to hide the field label
[Added] Added Email Select Field support for comma-separated email addresses
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Phone Field did not accept empty values
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where Phone Field could throw an HTML5 pattern attribute syntax error for some phone patterns
[Added] Added support to add Email, Email Select, Hidden, Invisible, Link, and Phone fields as columns in Element Index column configurator
[Added] Added Sprout Import integrations for Email, Email Select, Hidden, Invisible, Link, and Phone fields
[Added] Added craft.sproutFields.obfuscateEmailAddresses variable
[Improved] Updated Email, Link, and Phone field actions to use icons
[Improved] Added support for 'default' setting in Email Select template
[Improved] Added support for 'selected' setting in Email Select output
[Improved] Removed the use of wildcards when using Craft::import()
[Fixed] Fixed issue where Phone field mask did not display
[Fixed] Fixed incorrect log method name
[Fixed] Fixed issue where the placeholder setting did not display when using the Email and Link fields.
[Fixed] Fixed bug where Email Select field did not obfuscate email addresses in front-end output.
[Added] Added placeholder setting to Email, Link and Phone fields
[Added] Added Sprout Import integration for importing fake data into email fields
[Fixed] Fixed error when Email Select field is used with Sprout Forms getField tag
[Added] Added PHP 7 compatibility
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Notes field did not minimize when used within a Matrix field
[Added] Added migration to update legacy Sprout More Info fields to Notes fields
[Improved] Notes no longer requires a database column in the content table
[Fixed] Fixed error when Link field type was included on Recent Entries dashboard widget
[Fixed] Fixed issue where error message could be blank when the Email Field failed validation
[Fixed] Fixed issue where error message could be blank when the Link Field failed validation
# General
[Added] Added Plugin icon
[Added] Added Plugin description
[Added] Added link to documentation
[Added] Added link to plugin settings
[Added] Added link to release feed
# Fields
[Added] Added Email Select field (Initial Release)
[Added] Added Email Select field support for Sprout Forms and Sprout Email
[Added] Added Notes field (previously Sprout More Info)
[Added] Added Notes field support for Sprout Forms
[Added] Added support to expand/collapse Notes fields in the Control Panel and retain state
[Improved] Improved default styles for Notes field to accomodate more common elements
[Improved] Improved several naming conventions
[Improved] Improved behavior when updating Notes output setting to immediately display related options
[Improved] Improved phone validation to occur on `input` instead of on `blur`
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Phone field settings could load without making all selected settings visible
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Email, Link, and Phone field custom validation settings could remain even after they were toggled off
[Fixed] Fixed Phone field link to display if valid on page load
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where Unique Email validation didn't take into account new Elements
[Added] Added Phone Field (Initial Release)
[Added] Added Hidden Field (Initial Release)
[Added] Added Invisible Field (Initial Release)
[Added] Added Email Field (previously Sprout Email Field)
[Added] Added Link Field (previously Sprout Link Field)
[Improved] Standardized settings and naming conventions across all field types
[Improved] Updated Phone, Link, and Email field to support input types tel, url, and email
[Added] Added support for validation using HTML5 patterns and custom error messages
[Added] Added Sprout Forms front-end field support for Phone, Email, Link, Hidden, and Invisible fields.
